summary: Header/Footer were updated to reference new logo paths via a new branding constants module, and index.html now points to a generated favicon path. However, the diff does not show the required PNG assets being added under frontend/public/assets/generated, and several unrelated UI/content/style enhancements appear to have been introduced beyond swapping logo assets.

missing_requirements.requirement: Create upgraded Solar Sparkle logo PNG assets (mark, horizontal lockup, refined small mark v2) with transparent backgrounds and appropriate visual quality.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff only adds TypeScript constants that reference the new image filenames, but does not show any actual PNG image files being created/added (and the diff summary is LLM-readable files only). There is no evidence that the upgraded logo images themselves exist or were generated.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the upgraded logo image assets as static files under frontend/public/assets/generated and load them via /assets/generated/... paths without runtime/backend dependencies.
missing_requirements.reason: Although code references /assets/generated/... paths, the diff does not show any files added under frontend/public/assets/generated, so there is no evidence the static assets were actually added to the repo at the required location.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add a favicon image file and reference it from frontend/index.html.
missing_requirements.reason: frontend/index.html references /assets/generated/favicon-solar-sparkle.dim_64x64.png, but the diff does not show the favicon image file being added anywhere (e.g., frontend/public/assets/generated or frontend/public).

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced/changed branding copy via BRAND_TAGLINE and rendering it in the footer.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest is limited to swapping logo assets and adding a favicon; it explicitly lists non-goals around copy/marketing changes beyond what is necessary for the logo swap. Adding a tagline constant and displaying it is not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated footer social media links to specific external URLs opening in new tabs.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by any REQ; this is a navigation/content change beyond the logo swap.

hallucinated_features.description: Broad UI/animation/style enhancements across the frontend (e.g., global CSS animation utilities, Tailwind config extensions, header hover/scale effects, multiple page enhancements like calculator improvements).
hallucinated_features.reason: Non-goals explicitly avoid redesigning site layout/marketing sections beyond what is necessary to swap logo assets; these enhancements go beyond the requested logo/favicon update.
